sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-data-table
          :headers="headers"
          :items="books"
          class="elevation-1"
        >
          <template v-slot:[`item.actions`]="{ item }">
          <!-- <template #item.actions="{ item }"> -->
            <v-icon small class="mr-2" @click="editBook(item)">
              mdi-pencil
            </v-icon>
            <v-icon small @click="deleteBook(item._id)">
              mdi-delete
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-data-table>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-btn color="primary" @click="addBook">
          Add New Book
        </v-btn>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import BookService from '@/services/BookService';

export default {
  name: 'BookList',
  data() {
    return {
      books: [],
      headers: [
        { text: 'Title', value: 'title' },
        { text: 'Author', value: 'author' },
        { text: 'Genre', value: 'genre' },
        { text: 'ISBN', value: 'isbn' },
        { text: 'Actions', value: 'actions', sortable: false },
      ],
    };
  },
  created() {
    this.fetchBooks();
  },
  methods: {
    fetchBooks() {
      BookService.getAllBooks()
        .then(response => {
          this.books = response.data;
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error('There was an error fetching the books:', error);
        });
    },
    addBook() {
      // Navigate to the AddBook component or open a dialog for adding a new book
    },
    editBook() {
      // Navigate to the EditBook component or open a dialog for editing the book
    },
    deleteBook(bookId) {
      // Show a confirmation dialog before deleting the book
      if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this book?')) {
        BookService.deleteBook(bookId)
          .then(() => {
            this.fetchBooks(); // Refresh the list after deletion
          })
          .catch(error => {
            console.error('There was an error deleting the book:', error);
          });
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
